description:
Love…

 Perhaps the grass warbler flies in the third lunar month, and perhaps the earth closes in the twelfth lunar month.

In this world, no matter how much you sink, it is difficult to run away from the feeling ‘love’.

Who can guess what will happen in the end of this changing cycle.

NOTE: A collection of three short stories!>
